title: Rank Climbing Champs?
body: Hey Guys! What are a few champs that are buffed and are trends to play that would be good to climb the ladders in ranked right now? To get yourself out of Elo Hell?

replies.body: I hate her guts but Annie is great to climb with. Easy as all fuck but wins teamfights instantly if you aren't a retarded farmer. Can be played in 3 roles out of 5 too

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=iF6jIdIQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-04T23:37:19.801+0000)
>
> I hate her guts but Annie is great to climb with. Easy as all fuc but wins teamfights instantly if you aren't a retarded farmer. Can be played in 3 roles out of 5 too

support - mid - ????
What Best Burrito AU said hahah

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=iF6jIdIQ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-05T00:01:46.998+0000)
>
> support - mid - ????

Some people take her top. I don't think it's very strong and is much better mid/support but I've seen success with it before.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=iF6jIdIQ,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-11-05T00:56:12.190+0000)
>
> Some people take her top. I don't think it's very strong and is much better mid/support but I've seen success with it before.

Fair enough. Never seen one top people in gold / silver aren't that inventive XD
Any champ you are very good at. Even better a champ that you are good at that pretty much no one else plays.

The strongest champions/best for SoloQ for each role right now (in my opinion) would be:
Top - Fiora, Renekton, Darius, Gangplank.
Jungle - Rek'Sai, Elise, Lee Sin.
Mid - TF, Veigar, Brand, LeBlanc.
ADC - Graves, Kalista, Vayne.
Support - Blitzcrank, Tahm Kench, Thresh, Lulu, Brand.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Burrito AU,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=iF6jIdIQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-04T08:14:40.083+0000)
>
